channel.title: [HELP] Already online error [HELP]
channel.description: Alright, I have a server hosted by myself and there are no errors with it at all, it compiles fine, but every hour or so it disconnects all the players and when they try to reconnect it says that they are already online. Does anyone have a way of fixing this? That would be great, thanks.

item.title: [HELP] Already online error [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Mary_Jane Mary|Jane
item.description:
@Mary_Jane wrote:

The roy6:

that’s common to anyone pretty much…

No… it isn’t. It’s common for the server to restart every hour if you have a restarter on, not say that there already online…

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Already online error [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

Blood Realm:

Alright, I have a server hosted by myself and there are no errors with it at all, it compiles fine, but every hour or so it disconnects all the players and when they try to reconnect it says that they are already online. Does anyone have a way of fixing this? That would be great, thanks.

Use a stable framework.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Already online error [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

Try your antilag.java, it may ahve something in it which makes the server disconnect everyone after a certain amount of time, this would probably cause the already online problem, if it’s not in your antilag.java check your client.java?

Read full topic
